title: Conditional Grade Checker
description: Create a program to determine a student's grade based on their marks. If the marks are above 90, the grade is A. If the marks are between 80 and 90, the grade is B. If the marks are between 70 and 80, the grade is C. If the marks are between 60 and 70, the grade is D. If the marks are below 60, the grade is F.
